name: ed-jukebox
description: A companion app for Elite: Dangerous that makes your favorite soundtrack responsive to in-game events

scripts.make-icns: bash -c 'if type iconutil &> /dev/null; then mkdir -p build; iconutil --convert icns icon/Icon.iconset && mv icon/Icon.icns build/icon.icns; else echo '\''iconutil not available'\''; fi'
scripts.make-icon: npm run make-icns; cp -v icon/icon.iconset/icon_512@2x.png build/icon.png

author: SilverWolf
